name.jp: 体力の強化スクロール

description.en: Add a random STA stat to your Weapon or Armor. The stat can be anywhere from +1 to +4. Please note that this replaces any existing stat on the weapon. +1 = 64% / +2 = 30% / +3 = 5% / +4 = 1%
description.ar: Add a random STA stat to your Weapon or Armor. The stat can be anywhere from +1 to +4. Please note that this replaces any existing stat on the weapon. +1 = 64% / +2 = 30% / +3 = 5% / +4 = 1%
description.br: Adiciona pontos de  VIG em sua arma ou armadura. O aumento é aleatório entre +1 e +4. Nota: Qualquer estatística já existente em seu item será substituída. Chances: +1 (64%) / +2 (30%) / +3 (5%) / +4 (1%).
description.cns: 为你的武器或防具增加一个随机体质属性，属性可以是+1到+4之间的任何值。请注意，这将替换武器上任何现有的属性。+1 = 64% / +2 = 30% / +3 = 5% / +4 = 1%
description.de: Fügt einen zufällig gewählten STA Bonus, zwischen +1 und +4 deiner Waffe oder deiner Rüstung zu. Jeder vorhandene Status Wert wird bei diesem Vorgang überschrieben. +1 = 64% / +2 = 30% / +3 = 5% / +4 = 1%
description.fi: Add a random STA stat to your Weapon or Armor. The stat can be anywhere from +1 to +4. Please note that this replaces any existing stat on the weapon. +1 = 64% / +2 = 30% / +3 = 5% / +4 = 1%
description.fil: Add a random STA stat to your Weapon or Armor. The stat can be anywhere from +1 to +4. Please note that this replaces any existing stat on the weapon. +1 = 64% / +2 = 30% / +3 = 5% / +4 = 1%
description.fr: Ajoute une statistique END aléatoire à votre arme ou armure. La statistique peut aller de +1 à +4. Ceci remplace toute statistique existante sur l'arme. +1 = 64% / +2 = 30% / +3 = 5% / +4 = 1%
description.id: Tambahkan stat STA acak ke Weapon atau Armor. Stat bisa di mana saja dari +1 hingga +4. Harap dicatat bahwa ini menggantikan stat yang ada pada senjata. +1 = 64% / +2 = 30% / +3 = 5% / +4 = 1%
description.it: Add a random STA stat to your Weapon or Armor. The stat can be anywhere from +1 to +4. Please note that this replaces any existing stat on the weapon. +1 = 64% / +2 = 30% / +3 = 5% / +4 = 1%
description.jp: ランダムな STA ステータスを武器またはアーマーに追加します。ステータスは +1 から +4 までの範囲で指定できます。これにより、武器の既存のステータスが置き換えられることに注意してください。+1 = 64% / +2 = 30% / +3 = 5% / +4 = 1%
description.kr: Add a random STA stat to your Weapon or Armor. The stat can be anywhere from +1 to +4. Please note that this replaces any existing stat on the weapon. +1 = 64% / +2 = 30% / +3 = 5% / +4 = 1%
description.nl: Add a random STA stat to your Weapon or Armor. The stat can be anywhere from +1 to +4. Please note that this replaces any existing stat on the weapon. +1 = 64% / +2 = 30% / +3 = 5% / +4 = 1%
description.pl: Add a random STA stat to your Weapon or Armor. The stat can be anywhere from +1 to +4. Please note that this replaces any existing stat on the weapon. +1 = 64% / +2 = 30% / +3 = 5% / +4 = 1%
description.ru: Add a random STA stat to your Weapon or Armor. The stat can be anywhere from +1 to +4. Please note that this replaces any existing stat on the weapon. +1 = 64% / +2 = 30% / +3 = 5% / +4 = 1%
description.sp: Añade una estadística aleatoria de STA a tu Arma o Armadura. Puede añadir desde +1 hasta +4. Por favor ten en cuenta que esto anulará cualquier otra estadística que tenga el objeto.
description.sw: Add a random STA stat to your Weapon or Armor. The stat can be anywhere from +1 to +4. Please note that this replaces any existing stat on the weapon. +1 = 64% / +2 = 30% / +3 = 5% / +4 = 1%
description.th: เพิ่ม STA แบบสุ่มให้กับอาวุธหรือชุดเกราะของคุณ statสามารถเป็นเท่าไหร่ก็ได้ตั้งแต่ +1 ถึง +4 โปรดทราบว่าสิ่งนี้จะแทนที่statที่มีอยู่บนอาวุธ +1 = 64% / +2 = 30% / +3 = 5% / +4 = 1%
description.tw: 為你的武器或盔甲添加隨機體力數值，數值可以是 +1 到 +4 之間的任何值。請注意，這將替換武器上的任何現有數值。 +1 = 64% / +2 = 30% / +3 = 5% / +4 = 1%
description.vi: Thêm chỉ số STA ngẫu nhiên vào Weapon hoặc Armor của bạn. Chỉ số có thể ở bất kỳ đâu từ +1 đến +4. xin lưu ý rằng điều này thay thế bất kỳ chỉ số hiện có nào trên vũ khí. +1 = 64% / +2 = 30% / +3 = 5% / +4 = 1%
